body_html: See the PR coming in now that has a dynamic_bidirectional_rnn. That will return the split final states. We can't modify the output signature of bidirectional_rnn now for backwards compatibility reasons.
body_text: See the PR coming in now that has a dynamic_bidirectional_rnn.  That will return the split final states.  We can't modify the output signature of bidirectional_rnn now for backwards compatibility reasons.
body: See the PR coming in now that has a dynamic_bidirectional_rnn.  That will return the split final states.  We can't modify the output signature of bidirectional_rnn now for backwards compatibility reasons.
